block.p: I'm from New England and they call this storm a Nor'easter. Which really confused President Bush. When he heard a Nor'easter was coming, he said, ''Great, let's get the eggs out again.''
How many people weren't sure how to file taxes this year because their job is in India? I'm just curious.
I'm from New England and they call this storm a Nor'easter. Which really confused President Bush. When he heard a Nor'easter was coming, he said, ''Great, let's get the eggs out again.''
How many people weren't sure how to file taxes this year because their job is in India? I'm just curious.
Today on Capitol Hill, Attorney General Alberto Gonzales raised his right hand and swore to tell the truth. Then everybody had a good laugh and went back to business.

Campaign records now reveal that John Edwards was using his campaign money to get $400 haircuts in Beverly Hills. But Edwards insists this is in keeping with his view that there are two Americas: one that pays $400 for a haircut, and the other America that spends its money on stupid things like rent and food.

A man who was shot in the chest 40 years ago during the Vietnam war just had the bullet removed by surgeons this week. He said: ''That's the last time I sit in the waiting room at the Walter Reed Medical Center. They are so slow.''
